title: The Creative Thinker
additional-note: Volume 6, number 3 (published in 1962) has both an issue renewal, and a mention in the 1991 renewal for Richard Wetherill's 1963 book 'Home-Study Course in Humanetics'.  Due to its date, that renewal would cover the book, but not the issue contributions appearing in the book, since they had been published more than 28 years before the book renewal.  (Those contributions would presumably still be covered by the issue renewal, however.)
